thread.title: Defeated MNS Doe heads to court to challenge legitimacy of newly-elected Central Regional FA chairman Roy Arthur
thread.title_full: Defeated MNS Doe heads to court to challenge legitimacy of newly-elected Central Regional FA chairman Roy Arthur

title: Defeated MNS Doe heads to court to challenge legitimacy of newly-elected Central Regional FA chairman Roy Arthur
text:
10:40 CET Defeated MNS Doe heads to court to challenge legitimacy of newly-elected Central Regional FA chairman Roy Arthur - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Mathew Doe says he is heading to court to challenge the Central Regional FA elections that saw him lose his Executive Committee seat to Roy Arthur. 
Doe polled 24 votes as against the 26 garnered by his sole competitor to lose the elections that was held at the Cape Coast Stadium on Thursday. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
